title: Dispatch Demand Response Event
description: A VPP operator receives a request from the grid operator to curtail 5 MW of load in a specific zone for 2 hours.

tasks.description: Identify all enrolled commercial and industrial customers within the specified grid zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all eligible participants for the demand response event.

tasks.description: Calculate the total available load reduction from the identified customers based on their pre-committed levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there is 7 MW of available load reduction capacity.

tasks.description: Send dispatch signals to the participating customers' building management systems to achieve the 5 MW target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the curtailment signals.

tasks.description: Monitor the real-time load reduction to ensure the 5 MW target is met and sustained for the 2-hour period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides real-time updates on the event's performance.
